Trial_Design.evidence: In this supplementary analysis of 100 patients enrolled in a clinical trial ( NCT01187329 )

Participants.evidence: 97 patients underwent AVR for aortic stenosis

Objective.evidence: Our primary objective thus to characterize the effect of intraoperative events on LV function during AVR using echocardiographic measures of myocardial deformation.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Myocardial deformation assessed at the beginning of surgery was compared with the end of surgery using paired t-tests corrected for multiple comparisons.

Number_Randomised.evidence: In this supplementary analysis of 100 patients enrolled in a clinical trial

Number_Analysed.evidence: Echocardiographic images were acceptable for analysis in 72 patients for LV strain

Result_Outcome.evidence: LV strain did not change at the end of surgery compared with the beginning of surgery [difference: 0.7 (97.6%CI: 0.2, 1.5)%; P =0.07] while LV systolic strain rate improved (became more negative) [−0.3 (−0.4, −0.2) sec −1 ; P<0.001].
